      • getPluginSites

        public List<PluginSite> getPluginSites()
        Description copied from interface: PluginSiteManager
        Returns all the managed plugin sites.

        If there are no plugin sites an empty list is returned.

        Specified by:
        getPluginSites in interface PluginSiteManager

        Parameters:

      • addPluginSite

        public void addPluginSite(PluginSite pluginSite)
                   throws PluginException
        Description copied from interface: PluginSiteManager
        Adds a plugin site.

        If the plugin site already exists this method does nothing.

        Specified by:
        addPluginSite in interface PluginSiteManager
        Parameters:
        pluginSite - the plugin site to add
        Throws:
        PluginException

      • removePluginSite

        public void removePluginSite(PluginSite pluginSite)
                      throws PluginException
        Description copied from interface: PluginSiteManager
        Removes a plugin site.

        If the plugin site does not exist this method does nothing.

      • getPlugins

        public List<PluginVersions> getPlugins(PluginSite pluginSite)
                                throws PluginException
        Description copied from interface: PluginSiteManager
        Returns all the plugins available at the specified plugin site.

        If no plugins are available an empty list is returned.

        Specified by:

        pluginSite - the plugin site to contact
